member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the model.

member.summary: Gets or sets the list of languages supported by this model.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the model can perform text-to-speech conversion.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the model can perform voice conversion.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.Model.TokenCostFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the token cost factor for using this model.

member.summary: Represents a pronunciation dictionary locator in the ElevenLabs API.

member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the pronunciation dictionary.

member.summary: Gets or sets the version identifier of the pronunciation dictionary.

member.name: T:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.TextToSpeechRequest
member.summary: Represents a text-to-speech request in the ElevenLabs API.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.TextToSpeechRequest.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text that will be converted into speech.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.TextToSpeechRequest.ModelId
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the model to use for text-to-speech conversion.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.TextToSpeechRequest.LanguageCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the language code (ISO 639-1) used to enforce a language for the model.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.TextToSpeechRequest.VoiceSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets the voice settings to use for the text-to-speech conversion.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.TextToSpeechRequest.PronunciationDictionaryLocators
member.summary: Gets or sets the pronunciation dictionary locators to apply to the text.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.TextToSpeechRequest.Seed
member.summary: Gets or sets the seed for deterministic sampling.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.TextToSpeechRequest.PreviousText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text that came before the text of the current request.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.TextToSpeechRequest.NextText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text that comes after the text of the current request.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.TextToSpeechRequest.PreviousRequestIds
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of request IDs of the samples that were generated before this generation.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.TextToSpeechRequest.NextRequestIds
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of request IDs of the samples that come after this generation.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.TextToSpeechRequest.ApplyTextNormalization
member.summary: Gets or sets the text normalization mode.

member.name: T:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.Voice
member.summary: Represents a voice in the ElevenLabs API.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.Voice.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the voice.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.Voice.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the voice.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.Voice.Category
member.summary: Gets or sets the category of the voice (e.g., "professional", "cloned").

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.Voice.Labels
member.summary: Gets or sets the labels associated with the voice (e.g., accent, age, gender).

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.Voice.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the voice.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.Voice.Gender
member.summary: Gets or sets the gender of the voice.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.Voice.UseCase
member.summary: Gets or sets the use case for the voice.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.Voice.AvailableForTiers
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of subscription tiers this voice is available for.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.Voice.SupportedModels
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of models supported by this voice.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.Voice.Settings
member.summary: Gets or sets the settings for the voice.

member.name: T:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.VoiceSettings
member.summary: Represents the settings for a voice in the ElevenLabs API.

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.VoiceSettings.Stability
member.summary: Gets or sets the stability value for the voice. Higher values result in more stable and consistent audio generation at the cost of variety. Range: 0.0 to 1.0

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.VoiceSettings.SimilarityBoost
member.summary: Gets or sets the similarity boost value for the voice. Higher values make the voice more closely match the reference audio at the cost of variety. Range: 0.0 to 1.0

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.VoiceSettings.Style
member.summary: Gets or sets the style value for the voice. Higher values result in more expressive speech with more variance in tone. Range: 0.0 to 1.0

member.name: P:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.VoiceSettings.UseSpeakerBoost
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to use speaker boost for the voice. Speaker boost makes the voice sound more like the reference audio.

member.name: M:ElevenLabs.SDK.Models.VoiceSettings.Validate
member.summary: Validates that the voice settings are within acceptable ranges.
member.exception: Thrown when a setting is outside its valid range.
